name: mindbuffer
description: A note's manager app with the visuals of a Webchat

scripts.build:prebuild: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer
scripts.build: npm run build:prebuild && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.ts --projectDir ./.package
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:prebuild && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.ts --projectDir ./.package --mac
scripts.build:win: npm run build:prebuild && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.ts --projectDir ./.package --win
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:prebuild && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.ts --projectDir ./.package --linux
scripts.build:all: npm run build:prebuild && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.ts --projectDir ./.package ---mwl
scripts.start: cross-env MINDBUFFER_ENVIRONMENT=development npm run build:prebuild && concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start:electron" "babel-node -- renderer.esbuild.mjs --watch"
scripts.test: npm run test:pack && npm run test:start
